LanguageData.VanyaTA01mhgg.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#33ff00>Show moe</color>
LanguageData.VanyaTA01mhgg.degreeDatas.0.description: La la la~ I just look around. ·ω·
LanguageData.VanyaTA02mfsn.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#33ff00>Magic girl</color>
LanguageData.VanyaTA02mfsn.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be a magical girl, but [PAWN_pronoun] could not feel the power of magic on this planet.
LanguageData.VanyaTB01tzz.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#66ccff>Coordinator</color>
LanguageData.VanyaTB01tzz.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was genetically adjusted before born. [PAWN_possessive] indicators are better than ordinary people.
LanguageData.VanyaTB02cyz.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#66ccff>Space-time traveler</color>
LanguageData.VanyaTB02cyz.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] ran from other worlds. Everything has to start again in here, but the experience is still useful.
LanguageData.VanyaTB03hj.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#66ccff>Funny</color>
LanguageData.VanyaTB03hj.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is very humorous. [PAWN_possessive] jokes make everyone happy. [PAWN_pronoun] will be kind to the disfigured and tolerate unfriendly words.
LanguageData.VanyaTB04sczj.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#66ccff>Survival expert</color>
LanguageData.VanyaTB04sczj.degreeDatas.0.description: In order to survive, [PAWN_nameDef] can endure unimaginable difficulties. [PAWN_pronoun] adapts to different harsh conditions.
LanguageData.VanyaTC01rrwg.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#cc33cc>Delicate</color>
LanguageData.VanyaTC01rrwg.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with a soft bone and a more dexterous body. So [PAWN_pronoun] can do most of complex work besides fighting.
LanguageData.VanyaTC02tsjg.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#CC33CC>Born warrior</color>
LanguageData.VanyaTC02tsjg.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a harsh environment. [PAWN_pronoun] is adept at fighting because of [PAWN_possessive] special physique.
LanguageData.VanyaTC03fwgz.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#CC33CC>Range telepathy</color>
LanguageData.VanyaTC04cfts.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#cc33cc>Extraordinary</color>
LanguageData.VanyaTC04cfts.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a famous artist. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude.However, [PAWN_pronoun] can't endure too much pain.
LanguageData.VanyaTZ01xkdns.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#CDCDCD>Death stare</color>
LanguageData.VanyaTZ01xkdns.degreeDatas.0.description: For a long time, [PAWN_nameDef] always felt that someone was watching [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] thinks something is wrong.
LanguageData.VanyaTE01gsdzf.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#F08080>Gaoshi's blessing</color>
LanguageData.VanyaTE01gsdzf.degreeDatas.0.description: One day, [PAWN_nameDef] was chosen by an unusual soul.[PAWN_pronoun] got the relevant abilities and shortcomings in this way.
LanguageData.VanyaTS01by.degreeDatas.0.label: Bear
LanguageData.VanyaTS01by.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is the person on the top of the food chain. The place where ordinary people can't hold on for one day is the perfect stage for [PAWN_objective] to show [PAWN_possessive] survival techniques.
